scripts.outdated: (npm outdated || true) && lerna exec --stream --no-bail -- npm outdated
scripts.remove: lerna exec --stream --no-bail -- rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json *.tgz && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json  *.tgz
scripts.reinstall: npm run remove && npm run update
scripts.update: npm install && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --stream -- npm install && npm update && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --stream -- npm update
